properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Huyu ndiye,
Emmanueli yaani Mungu
pamoja nasi.
Aliyetajwa, na malaika kwamba
atakuwa mkombozi.
Tufurahi aleluya tufurahi aleluya,
Mungu mwana
leo kafufuka.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amefufuka mkombozi wetu,
tufurahi tuimbe aleluya.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kaburini hayumo ni mzima,
tufurahi tuimbe aleluya.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ukombozi sassa umetimia,
tufurahi tuimbe aleluya.
